definitions.definition: A figure of speech whereby something is made to seem smaller or less important than it actually is, either through phrasing or lack of emphasis , often for ironic effect.
An instance of such phrasing or lack of emphasis; an incomplete statement.
An incomplete disclosure that intentionally withholds relevant information.
